SELECT camp_number, camp_address, camp_name, camp_type_normal, camp_type_car, camp_type_caravan, camp_type_glamping, camp_latitude, camp_longitude FROM TB_CAMP WHERE camp_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR camp_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR camp_type_normal LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR camp_type_car LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR camp_type_caravan LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR camp_type_glamping LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
